yoast_head_json.title: IT Solutions for Manufacturing & Supply Chain — ITRex
yoast_head_json.description: In times of crisis, ITRex helps manufacturing and supply chain management companies digitalize, enhance, and automate processes and entire workflows. From implementing advanced data analytics to turning your legacy equipment and inventory into IoT systems, we’ll help you improve resilience and bottom line and reduce your environmental footprint.
